data.text: @RichardBarrow @AtichartEsso Ok so you are in January huh really A I cinda kid about Saturday night

According to this notice, starting from Saturday 8th January, the commuter boat service from Wat Si Bunrueang to Phan Fa Lilat will operate every Saturday in addition to weekdays. But still no service on Sundays and public holidays. Thanks to @AtichartEsso for the update. https://t.co/mQrQdgmhs6
@AtichartEsso @RichardBarrow Thanks very much. I will post that update now.
@AtichartEsso @RichardBarrow Thanks, I asked at the pier as I wanted to go on them and they said it doesnâ€™t run at the weekend. I will try again next Saturday.
@RichardBarrow Too bad - a convenient way to move across  Bangkok. Wonder if regular commuter service has been reduced as well?
